oddities.text: Phase 1 doesn't begin taking damage until the potato opens its mouth.
The first projectile that lands on the onion will not deal any damage.

tricks.text: At the start of the fight, top runners will go to the left and prepare an up+right Lobber to play around Oddity #1.
'Lobbah': After the Phase 2 Lobber trap, top runners will move left and aim up+right with Spread so only a singular bullet will be eaten by Oddity #2.

oddities.text: If you crouch and shoot in a specific spot in front of Ribby, you can hit both frogs to generate extra cards. This will NOT deal double damage until Phase 2.
After the fight has crossed the Phase 1/2 damage threshold, you can shoot in the Oddity #1 spot to hit both frogs for double damage.
After the fight has crossed the Phase 2/3 damage threshold, you cannot deal additional overdamage. Your next opportunity to deal damage is when the slot machine opens up.

tricks.text: Taking advantage of Oddity #2, you can shoot downward Lobber EXs to deal quadruple damage.
After parrying the slot machine arm, the slots will spin and then flash like '1-2-3, 1-2-3, 1-2-3'. At the third 1 in that sequence, that's the visual cue to shoot your Lobber EX.

If you parry the slot machine arm and start holding shoot during the parry lag, and you pair this with Trick #2, your Lobber timing will be perfect for a same-weapon Kaleva swap EX when the slot machine opens up.

advancedTricks.text: It's possible to hit 4x or even 5x Lobber EXs when the EX collides with the ground and a tiger platform on the same frame.
You can do a frame-perfect pause buffer at the end of a slot machine attack to continue attacking the machine after you're supposed to.
